title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.20 - Designated payment office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 18.20 - Designated payment office

State Regulations
(a) Each
agency shall record on every invoice the date received at the designated
payment office. Each agency shall identify the designated payment office to
which a proper invoice is to be submitted by a contractor. If the contract does
not contain the mailing address of a designated payment office, and the agency
has not otherwise notified the contractor of this address, the designated
payment office shall be deemed to be any office of the agency to which the
contractor reasonably sends a proper invoice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
18.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
